page.title: 16FARM SURVEY page 7
page.content: {Halswell Farm The farm has 72 acres it has 17 pasture fields There aren,t any fields used for growing crops other then grass. They have three fields used for hay and silage . They dont grow any crops. {Animals They have 6 milking cows and 13 beef cows 96 breeding ewes 70 lambs for meat no pigs 1 hen and no geese. {Machinery He has 1 tractor and 10 other machines which he did not specify. {Workers The farm has 1 full time worker and 1 part time worker.{ {Other details The grand daughter of the farmer is taking part in this project at Ilsington C.E. Pimary School, South Devon.
